name: part_008
file: tmp_【#ときのそらお披露目生誕祭】アイドルになりたいわたしの生誕祭！【ホロライブ⧸ときのそら】 [gL6HizKO-Gc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora and Hakos Baelz perform the song 'Grip!'.
MC segment between songs where Baelz wishes Sora a happy birthday.
Tokino Sora performs 'Seishun Archive' with Natsuiro Matsuri and Hakui Koyori.
Final MC segment where Matsuri, Koyori, and Baelz celebrate Sora's birthday and present her with a bouquet.

subtitles.original: 光るよな Real な日常
subtitles.english: A shining, real daily life

subtitles.original: 大切なものは何だ?
subtitles.english: What is the most important thing?

subtitles.original: 贅沢な世界の中に
subtitles.english: In this extravagant world

subtitles.original: 見え隠れする永遠の欠片
subtitles.english: Are glimpses of eternal fragments

subtitles.original: さわって つかんで
subtitles.english: Touch it, grasp it

subtitles.original: 僕らの今をきっちり歩いてこう
subtitles.english: Let's walk firmly through our "now"

subtitles.original: 最後には笑っちゃおう
subtitles.english: In the end, let's just laugh

subtitles.original: 僕らの今をきっちり歩いてこう
subtitles.english: Let's walk firmly through our "now"

subtitles.original: そら先輩！
subtitles.english: Sora-senpai!

subtitles.original: お誕生日おめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Happy birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: 信じ合う仲間と一緒に
subtitles.english: Together with friends who believe in each other

subtitles.original: 飛ばせ 拳を 突き上げよう
subtitles.english: Let it fly, let's thrust our fists up

subtitles.original: 終わらない青春に
subtitles.english: To an endless youth

subtitles.original:
青春アーカイブ
作詞・作曲・編曲：HoneyWorks
subtitles.english:
Seishun Archive
Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: HoneyWorks

subtitles.original: まずは深呼吸 落ち着いて Hey! みんなで揃えば 来るじゃんじゃん
subtitles.english: First take a deep breath and calm down, Hey! When we're all together, it'll come, jan jan

subtitles.original: 光る 透き通る 声 合わせて
subtitles.english: Let out a shining, clear voice in unison

subtitles.original: 青春 感じている もう 最高潮
subtitles.english: Feeling youth, it's already the climax

subtitles.original: 成長した姿を見せたい
subtitles.english: I want to show how much I've grown

subtitles.original: リハは完璧 本番はもっと電撃で
subtitles.english: The rehearsal was perfect, the real performance will be even more electric

subtitles.original: 大切な思い出 たくさんあるけどね まだ
subtitles.english: There are many precious memories, but still

subtitles.original: 感傷に浸ってる暇はない
subtitles.english: There's no time to indulge in sentimentality

subtitles.original: 今世紀最大の夏が始まる
subtitles.english: The greatest summer of this century is beginning

subtitles.original: 想像の果てにある高み
subtitles.english: The heights that lie beyond imagination

subtitles.original: 勝ち取った景色は尊い
subtitles.english: The scenery we've won is precious

subtitles.original: 逃げるな 限界の壁超えて
subtitles.english: Don't run away, cross the wall of limits

subtitles.original: 僕らはまだチャレンジャー
subtitles.english: We are still challengers

subtitles.original: 冷たい声に溺れたって
subtitles.english: Even if we drown in cold voices

subtitles.original: かすかな望みをたぐり寄せるように
subtitles.english: As if pulling in a faint hope

subtitles.original: 期待外れだと誰かが嘆く
subtitles.english: Someone laments that it was a disappointment

subtitles.original: 痛いと痛いがいつも戦う
subtitles.english: Pain and pain are always fighting

subtitles.original: プライドだけを頼りに抗う 自分を信じたい
subtitles.english: Resisting with only pride as a guide, I want to believe in myself

subtitles.original: 努力は報われる 笑いたい奴は笑ってな
subtitles.english: Effort pays off, let those who want to laugh, laugh

subtitles.original: 感傷に浸ってる暇はない
subtitles.english: There's no time to indulge in sentimentality

subtitles.original: 今世紀最大の夏が始まる
subtitles.english: The greatest summer of this century is beginning

subtitles.original: 反響が足りない もっともっと
subtitles.english: Not enough reverberation, more, more!

subtitles.original: 後悔はさせない
subtitles.english: I won't let you regret it

subtitles.original: 想像の果てにある高み
subtitles.english: The heights that lie beyond imagination

subtitles.original: 勝ち取った景色は尊い
subtitles.english: The scenery we've won is precious

subtitles.original: 逃げるな 限界の壁超えて
subtitles.english: Don't run away, cross the wall of limits

subtitles.original: 僕らはまだチャレンジャー
subtitles.english: We are still challengers

subtitles.original: お邪魔しまーす！
subtitles.english: We're barging in!

subtitles.original: お邪魔しまーす！
subtitles.english: We're barging in!

subtitles.original: そら先輩！
subtitles.english: Sora-senpai!

subtitles.original: お誕生日おめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Happy birthday!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 言っちゃいますけどさ
subtitles.english: I'm just gonna say it

subtitles.original: そうです先輩、可愛すぎて...
subtitles.english: That's right senpai, you're too cute...

subtitles.original: やっほー！
subtitles.english: Yah-hoo!

subtitles.original: 結婚してください！
subtitles.english: Please marry me!

subtitles.original: 求婚しちゃった！
subtitles.english: I proposed!

subtitles.original: 乗らないか？
subtitles.english: Won't you accept?

subtitles.original: 乗ってくれよ！
subtitles.english: Please accept!

subtitles.original: もう感謝しちゃった！
subtitles.english: I'm just so grateful!
